channel.title: Posts on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Terminal

item.title: From notes to blog
item.description:
Based on NetworkChuck’s YT video I got inspired and created my first blog. Fully automated, with the use of Obsidian. Below the adapted instructions. I leave as much as possible in tact, but I am not using hostinger, I just leave the files within github. Also I struggled with the images, while this didn’t work for me. Thanks to some help of chatgtp I found the solution.

Because I use Windows, I removed the Linux/ Mac instructions, but in general it is the same, except the scripts, which you needs to adapt in that case (use chatgtp).

item.title: VPN Promotion
item.description:
1. Aanmelden CashbackXL via https://www.cashbackxl.nl/?share=danielog-9d68 (als het goed is krijg jij dan n√≥g 2,50 korting via member get member linkje)

  2. Via cashbackxl site klikken naar Private Internet Access (even goed letten op instructies ivm cookies), ik had 2 jaar + 2 maanden voor 51,74

  3. Ik kreeg 47,68 cashback via CashbackXL

Daarna installeren en locatie op VS zetten
